li.label: Clear Default Shelf Storage
li.tooltip: Sets default storage on shelves to be empty and priority to be normal.

li.label: Clear Default Bookcase Storage
li.tooltip: Sets default storage on bookcases to be empty and priority to be normal.

li.label: Clear Default Outfit Stand Storage
li.tooltip: Sets default storage on outfit stands to be empty and priority to be normal.

li.label: Clear Default Hopper Storage
li.tooltip: Sets default storage on hoppers to be empty and priority to be normal.

li.label: Disable Storing Rotten Items on Shelves
li.tooltip: Sets default storage for rotten items on shelves to be false.

li.label: Disable Storing Rotten Items in Stockpiles
li.tooltip: Sets default storage for rotten items in stockpiles to be false.

li.label: Disable Storing Rotten Items in Dumping Stockpiles
li.tooltip: Sets default storage for rotten items in dumping stockpiles to be false. This can be useful to prevent pawns from bringing random rotting animal corpses to dumping stockpiles.

li.label: Disable Storing Tainted Items on Shelves
li.tooltip: Sets default storage for tainted items on shelves and outfit stands to be false.

li.label: Disable Storing Tainted Items in Stockpiles
li.tooltip: Sets default storage for tainted items in stockpiles to be false.

li.label: Disable Storing Biocoded Items on Shelves
li.tooltip: Sets default storage for biocoded items (weapons and apparel) on shelves and outfit stands to be false.

li.label: Disable Storing Biocoded Items in Stockpiles
li.tooltip: Sets default storage for biocoded items (weapons and apparel) in stockpiles to be false.
